item.title: Packer: conditionally omit HCL block configuration
item.description: Problem You’re using Packer to build AWS EC2 AMIs. How can you parameterize builds to conditionally configure or omit amazon-ebs.launch_block_device_mappings based on the value of an input variable? Solution Leverage dynamic blocks; based on an input variable value, pass a for_each argument with a length of 0 to omit the configuration of launch_block_device_mappings. Example The following Packer template supports a create_nonroot_devices input variable. By default, its value is false; packer build results in an AMI with no nonroot launch_block_device_mappings:
